data.title: At NeurIPS, NVIDIA Advances Open Model Development for Digital and Physical AI
data.description: NVIDIA releases new AI tools for speech, safety and autonomous driving — including NVIDIA DRIVE Alpamayo-R1, the world’s first open industry-scale reasoning vision language action model for mobility — and a new independent benchmark recognizes the openness and transparency of NVIDIA Nemotron models and datasets.
data.author: Bryan Catanzaro
